description: Every year during the week of Valentine's Day, we raise money for the Downtown Women's Center through our Love Notes fundraiser during which we offer live and virtual serenades. This year, we delivered over 100 Love Notes and raised almost $2,000! You can support our cause by ordering a Love Note for a loved one.
We had the privilege of celebrating the success of our annual Love Notes fundraiser by singing for the incredible women at the Downtown Women's Center.

links.text: Learn more about the Downtown Women's Center

organization: Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center with UCLA People-Animal Connection
description: We had the honor of caroling for the amazing patients and dedicated staff at Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center alongside UCLA People-Animal Connection's talented dogs and wonderful team. We sang some classic Christmas and Hanukkah carols for the December holidays and some of our Love Notes songs for Valentine's Day.

links.text: Learn more about UCLA People-Animal Connection
Read about us on KNX News

description: For the March "Music and Entertainment"-themed reading club, we performed for the brilliant students at MacArthur Park Elementary School. We also expanded our volunteer experience beyond singing by reading to the students with the passionate volunteers at Reading to Kids.

links.text: Learn more about Reading to Kids

organization: Habitat for Humanity with UCLA Bruin Belles Service Association
description: We competed in UCLA Bruin Belles Service Association's first-ever charity dodgeball tournament—the BelleBall Tournament—and won! As the winners, we had the opportunity to donate $1,000 to a charity of our choice. We chose Habitat for Humanity as the charity to receive the donation.

links.text: Learn more about Habitat for Humanity
Learn more about UCLA Bruin Belles Service Association

description: Every winter, we host a clothing drive during our holiday concert and collect clothing donations for Los Angeles Mission.

links.text: Learn more about Los Angeles Mission

description: Every spring, we organize a school supplies drive during our final concert and donate school supplies to the Los Angeles Unified School District's Homeless Education Office.

links.text: Learn more about the Homeless Education Office

description: We visited the pediatric unit at the UCLA Santa Monica Medical Center and had the honor of singing for the patients there as part of the Chase Child Life Program. We sang a mix of pop songs to help ease the stress of a hospital stay.

links.text: Learn more about the Chase Child Life Program

description: We performed virtually for Dance Marathon at UCLA in 2020 to support the Pediatric AIDS Coalition's mission to fundraise for and raise awareness about the fight against AIDS in children.

links.text: Learn more about the Pediatric AIDS Coalition

description: We were honored to sing for the incredibly strong patients and hardworking staff at Providence Saint John's Health Center in Santa Monica.

links.text: Learn more about Saint John's Health Center Foundation

organization: Mother's Day at the Downtown Women's Center
description: For Mother's Day, we had the privilege of singing to the inspiring women at the Downtown Women's Center.

links.text: Learn more about the Downtown Women's Center
